name: SupportColmAndKyle
_source: speak;Colm;Kyle, do you have a minute?
speak;Kyle;Is something the matter with her?
speak;Colm;It was a while ago, but when she went to bed, she was...
speak;Kyle;What happened after she retired to her room?|Colm, don't toy with me.|Just tell me!
speak;Colm;The princess looked like she was having trouble falling asleep.|She kept pacing.

speak;Kyle;That's not good.|It's very important for her to get enough rest during this tough march.|This war has been very hard for Prince Ephraim and Princess Eirika.|I'm sure she's probably spent a few nights worrying, but-
speak;Colm;Hey!|I just remembered that I have this secret remedy my mother used to make.|It started off as a freckle cream, but it turns out that it works pretty well with insomnia, too.
speak;Kyle;Really.|That's a good idea.|I'm sure Prince Ephraim and Lady Eirika would love to have something like that.
speak;Colm;OK, then.|I'll give it to her next time I see her.|I'll let you know how it goes.
speak;Kyle;What is it this time, Colm?
speak;Kyle;And...?|That doesn't seem like news or anything.
speak;Colm;It's big news for me!|And for you, too!|The future of Renais is not looking good if he hates studying as much as I do.
speak;Kyle;Don't worry about it.|He might not like studying much, but no one is as bad as you.|Besides, if you're bringing this up to denigrate him, you are in serious trouble.
speak;Colm;Not at all!|I'm just worried about Prince Ephraim and Princess Eirika.
speak;Kyle;I understand.|But this news was really useless.|In the future, please only bring me relevant information.
speak;Colm;Kyle, I have some useful news!
speak;Colm;Heh heh heh...|Well, it's a secret about you.
speak;Kyle;A secret about me?|What is it?
speak;Colm;You have a girlfriend!|Her name is Meriella!|You send letters to her all the time, don't you!
speak;Kyle;Oh, that.|I've been meaning to tell you about her.
speak;Colm;I'm so glad to hear that, Kyle.|Let me know if you need to talk to someone.|Long-distance relationships can be hard.|I can't believe it!|Stuffy old Kyle is in love!
speak;Kyle;In love?|Me?|I think you're confused.|Meriella is not my girlfriend.|She is one of my teammates.
speak;Colm;Workplace romance, is it?|Say no more.|I understand.
speak;Kyle;Just shut up and listen to me.|Meriella is the alias we use for Renais knights on undercover missions.

speak;Kyle;Precisely.|We send mail addressed to Meriella, which only the Renais knights know.|The contents are always the same.|We let them know that Prince Ephraim and Princess Eirika are safe.|It's all written in secret code.|That's the letter I was sending.
speak;Colm;Even though we're in the middle of a war, does it really have to be so complicated?
speak;Kyle;Yes.|Better to be safe than sorry.
speak;Colm;I see.|Well, would you like me to deliver that letter?
speak;Kyle;No.|Every single soldier is important in this war.|We need you here.
speak;Kyle;Um...|Yes. Although you do bring me some pointless tidbits, you have also been a big help.

speak;Colm;Great!|This is so encouraging!|Until recently, I thought I'd never have any real connection with the knights.|But it's different now.|Now, I consider everyone involved in this war, especially the knights like you, to be my friends.|I will always fight for my friends!
speak;Kyle;Thank you, Colm.|Civilians and knights...|Together, we'll restore peace in Renais.
